column4: Hi there know its a stupid thing to ask and will prob get slammed for asking but does anyone know of an autorun/autostart script for Linux or if there is such a thing?
ermm something like an autorun.inf for linux???
nice thing about this room - you will not get slammed - ubuntu supports "start up" applications by account and there is upstart for system wide things - what do you want to do
who is absolutely right - ME I ASSUME
as previously asked - what do you want to do
